name: enhanced-admin-user-search
description: Enhances the WordPress admin user search functionality to allow searching by first name, last name, full name, display name, and user ID.
author: Mayank Majeji

scripts.bump:patch: bump patch --commit 'Version %s.' class-admin-user-search.php package.json package-lock.json readme.txt
scripts.bump:minor: bump minor --commit 'Version %s.' class-admin-user-search.php package.json package-lock.json readme.txt
scripts.bump:major: bump major --commit 'Version %s.' class-admin-user-search.php package.json package-lock.json readme.txt
scripts.icons: sharp -i .wordpress-org/icon.svg -o .wordpress-org/icon-128x128.png -f png --palette resize 128 128 && sharp -i .wordpress-org/icon.svg -o .wordpress-org/icon-256x256.png -f png --palette resize 256 256 && sharp -i .wordpress-org/icon-light.svg -o docs/assets/logo.png -f png --palette resize 256 256
